name: Bellhop
description:
You are a bellhop at the Hareton Resort & Spa, a hotel inside a tree! In this fast-paced party game, you compete with other bellhops to earn the most money before time runs out.

Your phone is the controller, your computer is the hotel! Play with up to four players on your local wifi! Check in guests to expand the hotel  and earn small tips, or play minigames to earn more sizable tips but risk getting nothing if you don't perform well!

Features:

  • 15+ unique minigames
  • 4+ animal guest NPCs
  • An interactive hotel layout
